member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.Cion.ClientBase
member.summary: An abstract class to represent cion client.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.Cion.ClientBase.ServiceName
member.summary: Gets the service name of current cion client.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.Cion.ClientBase.PeerInfo
member.summary: Gets peer info of connected cion server.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Cion.ClientBase.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: The constructor of ClientBase class.
member.remarks: The maximum length of service name is 512.
member.exception: Thrown when the given service name is too long.
Thrown when there is not enough memory to continue the execution of the method.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Cion.ClientBase.#ctor(System.String,Tizen.Applications.Cion.SecurityInfo)
member.summary: The constructor of ClientBase class.
member.remarks: The maximum length of service name is 512.
member.exception: Thrown when the given service name is too long.
Thrown when there is not enough memory to continue the execution of the method.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Cion.ClientBase.TryDiscovery
member.summary: Starts discovering cion servers.
member.exception: Thrown when the discovery operation is already in progress.
Thrown when an application does not have the privilege to access this method.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Cion.ClientBase.StopDiscovery
member.summary: Stops discovering.
member.exception: Thrown when the client is not discovering.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Cion.ClientBase.Connect(Tizen.Applications.Cion.PeerInfo)
member.summary: Connects with the cion server.
member.exception: Thrown when the client cannot connect to server.
Thrown when an application does not have the privilege to access this method.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Cion.ClientBase.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects from the cion server.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Cion.ClientBase.SendData(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Sends data synchronously to the connected cion server.
member.exception: Thrown when the given data is invalid.
Thrown when there is no connected cion server or failed to receive reply.
Thrown when a timeout occurred.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Cion.ClientBase.SendPayloadAsync(Tizen.Applications.Cion.Payload)
member.summary: Sends payload asynchronously to the connected cion server.
member.exception: Thrown when the payload is not valid.
Thrown when there is no connected cion server or failed to send payload.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Cion.ClientBase.OnConnectionResult(Tizen.Applications.Cion.PeerInfo,Tizen.Applications.Cion.ConnectionResult)
member.summary: The result callback of connection request.
member.param: The peer info of the cion server.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Cion.ClientBase.OnPayloadReceived(Tizen.Applications.Cion.Payload,Tizen.Applications.Cion.PayloadTransferStatus)
member.summary: The callback invoked when received payload.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Cion.ClientBase.OnDiscovered(Tizen.Applications.Cion.PeerInfo)
member.summary: The callback invoked when the cion server discovered.
member.param: The peer info of discovered cion server.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Cion.ClientBase.OnDisconnected(Tizen.Applications.Cion.PeerInfo)
member.summary: The callback invoked when disconnected with cion client.
member.param: The peer info of the cion server.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Cion.ClientBase.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases any unmanaged resources used by this object. Can also dispose any other disposable objects.
member.param: If true, disposes any disposable objects. If false, does not dispose disposable objects.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Cion.ClientBase.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the ClientBase class.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.Cion.FilePayload.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: The constructor of FilePayload class.
member.param: The path of file for the FilePayload.
member.remarks: http://tizen.org/privilege/mediastorage is needed if the file path is relevant to media storage. http://tizen.org/privilege/externalstorage is needed if the file path is relevant to external storage.
member.exception: Thrown when the input file path is invalid.
Thrown when an application does not have the privilege to access this method.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.Cion.FilePayload.ReceivedFileName
member.summary: Gets the name of received file.

member.summary: Gets size of received file.

member.summary: Gets total size of the file.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.Cion.FilePayload.PayloadType
member.summary: Gets type of the payload.

member.summary: Saves file of payload to speicific path.
member.param: The path of file to save.
member.remarks: http://tizen.org/privilege/mediastorage is needed if the file path is relevant to media storage. http://tizen.org/privilege/externalstorage is needed if the file path is relevant to external storage.
member.exception: Thrown when the input file path is invalid.
Thrown when an application does not have the privilege to access this method.
